text: The Trouble with Harry is a 1955 American black comedy movie directed by Alfred Hitchcock and was based on the 1950 novel of the same name by Jack Trevor Story. It starring Shirley MacLaine (in her movie debut), John Forsythe, Edmund Gwenn, Mildred Natwick, Mildred Dunnock, Jerry Mathers, Parker Fennelly and was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was a box office failure. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1950s mystery movies Category:1955 comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Alfred Hitchcock Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: The Trouble with Harry
